statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, total_balance FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, total_balance FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_balance > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, statement_date, total_balance FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_balance) AS total_balance_sum FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_balance) AS average_balance FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(total_balance) > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, DATE_FORMAT(statement_date, '%Y-%m') AS month_year, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id, month_year ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;

SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_balance) AS total_balance_sum, MAX(total_balance) AS max_balance, MIN(total_balance) AS min_balance FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id IN (321, 456) GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_balance_sum DESC;
SELECT * FROM statement_summary;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM statement_summary WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM statement_summary WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_activity ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT statement_id, transaction_description, transaction_amount FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM statement_summary ORDER BY statement_date DESC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM statement_summary WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT statement_id, COUNT(activity_id) FROM account_activity GROUP BY statement_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) > 5;
SELECT statement_id, SUM(total_amount) FROM statement_summary GROUP BY statement_id ORDER BY SUM(total_amount) DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, account_balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(account_balance) as avg_balance FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_activities WHERE description LIKE '%deposit%' AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_activity_amount) AS total_amount FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, statement_date, total_activity_count FROM customer_accounts JOIN monthly_statements ON customer_accounts.customer_id = monthly_statements.customer_id WHERE total_activity_count < 10;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(activity_date) AS latest_activity_date FROM account_activities GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Account ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM Customer c JOIN Account a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT statement_date, total_balance FROM MonthlyStatement WHERE statement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY statement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM Transaction WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, statement_date, total_balance FROM Customer INNER JOIN MonthlyStatement ON Customer.customer_id = MonthlyStatement.customer_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, statement_contents FROM customers INNER JOIN statements ON customers.customer_id = statements.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 2 AND transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, statement_contents FROM statements WHERE customer_id = 3 AND statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM statement_history WHERE modification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY history_id ASC;
